resources.string: "Its a basic design template focusing on structure of a music player android application.\n This screen would list the top hits for the selected genre.\n Using the MediaPlayer class of Android SDK, we can playback audio from a source."
This activity displays the chosen song and will stream it.
"This activity will displays the payment options.\n The Android Pay API offers a quick and easy path to enable secure,\n one touch payments in your app using your existing payment infrastructure."
